PubMed in Perplexity: Simplify Your Medical Searches

Just type in your keywords or questions!

While Perplexity is incredibly useful, researchers sometimes find its citation sources less than ideal.
With "PubMed in Perplexity," your searches will prioritize papers published in PubMed!

How to Use:
Enter Your Query: Type your keywords or questions in the search bar.
